byline.contributor: Anne Barnard in Beirut, Neil MacFarquhar in Moscow and Rick Gladstone in New York contributed reporting.

abstract: American officials say Sec of State John Kerry will meet with representatives from regional powers to attempt to craft cease-fire for Syrian city of Aleppo; move comes week after talks with Russia about Syria were halted due to prospect of war crimes investigation over Russian bombing campaign.
lead_paragraph: The secretary of state will meet with representatives from the regional powers most directly involved in the Syria conflict.
snippet: The secretary of state will meet with representatives from the regional powers most directly involved in the Syria conflict....

headline.main: Kerry Opens a New Diplomatic Push for a Cease-Fire in Aleppo
headline.print_headline: Kerry to Meet With Regional Powers in New Push for a Cease-Fire in Aleppo
